problem.markdown:
Which of the following describes Runtime best? Check all that apply. [x] Measures how long a function takes to report in the worst case [x] Measures the efficiency of a function [ ] Checks the style of the functions [ ] All of the above
[explanation] The runtime of a function can tell us how long a function will take to report depending on it's input. This is importnant to know when we want to know the worst or best runtime of a function to make it more efficient. [explanation]
problem.p: Which of the following describes Runtime best? Check all that apply.

checkboxgroup.choice: Measures how long a function takes to report in the worst case
Measures the efficiency of a function
Checks the style of the functions

div.p: The runtime of a function can tell us how long a function will take to report depending on it's input. This is importnant to know when we want to know the worst or best runtime of a function to make it more efficient.
